channel.title: Need help with pimpscape!
channel.description:
on my server i have succefully compiled to the point where it says starting pimpscape then i leave compile only to find that my run.bat isn't working
this is some vital information i will leave you with so that you guys can help me
note: iam running on the latest java and i have both [jdk] and [jre] installed
in my compile folder :
@echo off title m0d Compiler "C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09in/java.exe" server pause
and when i click run.bat it says javac not recognised :S please help me guys ++rep for help :)
in my run.bat folder :
@echo off title BcScape Server java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server @pause
in my environmental variables
CLASSPATH = C:/program filesjavajdk1.5.0.09in;%CLASSPATH%;.
PATH = C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0.09injava.exe
please help![br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 04:49:48 PM[/size][hr]cmon guys cant u suggest anything or any codeS?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 04:52:01 PM[/size][hr]5 views and no replies

item.title: Need help with pimpscape!
item.dc:creator: @l0l_l0rd l0l l0rd
item.description:
@l0l_l0rd wrote:

on my server i have succefully compiled to the point where it says starting pimpscape
then i leave compile only to find that my run.bat isn’t working

this is some vital information i will leave you with so that you guys can help me

note: iam running on the latest java and i have both [jdk] and [jre] installed

in my compile folder :

@echo off
title m0d Compiler
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:Program FilesJavajre1.5.0_09in/java.exe” server
pause

and when i click run.bat it says javac not recognised :S please help me guys ++rep for help

in my run.bat folder :

@echo off
title BcScape Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
@pause

in my environmental variables

CLASSPATH = C:/program filesjavajdk1.5.0.09in;%CLASSPATH%;.

PATH = C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0.09injava.exe

please help![br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 04:49:48 PM[/size][hr]cmon guys cant u suggest anything or any codeS?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 17, 2006, 04:52:01 PM[/size][hr]5 views and no replies
